englishText: Blessings and Curses
teluguText: Blessings and Curses

englishText: All these blessings will come on you and accompany you if you obey the LORD your God.
teluguText: All these blessings will come on you and accompany you if you obey the LORD your God.

englishText: Death of Moses
teluguText: Death of Moses

englishText: And Moses the servant of the LORD died there in Moab.
teluguText: And Moses the servant of the LORD died there in Moab.

englishText: Fall of Jericho
teluguText: Fall of Jericho

englishText: When the trumpets sounded, the wall collapsed; so every man charged straight in, and they took the city.
teluguText: When the trumpets sounded, the wall collapsed; so every man charged straight in, and they took the city.

englishText: Sun Stands Still
teluguText: Sun Stands Still

englishText: So the sun stood still, and the moon stopped, till the nation avenged itself on its enemies.
teluguText: So the sun stood still, and the moon stopped, till the nation avenged itself on its enemies.

teluguText: Gideon's Victory

englishText: They blew their trumpets and broke the jars... and the Midianite army fled.
teluguText: They blew their trumpets and broke the jars... and the Midianite army fled.

englishText: Samson and Delilah
teluguText: Samson and Delilah

teluguText: Samson said, 'Let me die with the Philistines!' Then he pushed with all his might, and the temple fell.

englishText: Ruth Meets Boaz
teluguText: Ruth Meets Boaz

englishText: May the LORD repay you for what you have done.
teluguText: May the LORD repay you for what you have done.

englishText: Ruth Marries Boaz
teluguText: Ruth Marries Boaz

englishText: So Boaz took Ruth and she became his wife.
teluguText: So Boaz took Ruth and she became his wife.

englishText: Samuel Hears God
teluguText: Samuel Hears God

englishText: The LORD came and stood there, calling as at the other times, 'Samuel! Samuel!'
teluguText: The LORD came and stood there, calling as at the other times, 'Samuel! Samuel!'

englishText: Saul Anointed King
teluguText: Saul Anointed King

englishText: Samuel took a flask of oil and poured it on Saul's head and kissed him, saying, 'Has not the LORD anointed you ruler over his inheritance?'
teluguText: Samuel took a flask of oil and poured it on Saul's head and kissed him, saying, 'Has not the LORD anointed you ruler over his inheritance?'

teluguText: David and Goliath

teluguText: So David triumphed over the Philistine with a sling and a stone.

englishText: David Brings the Ark to Jerusalem
teluguText: David Brings the Ark to Jerusalem

englishText: David, wearing a linen ephod, danced before the LORD with all his might.
teluguText: David, wearing a linen ephod, danced before the LORD with all his might.

englishText: God's Covenant with David
teluguText: God's Covenant with David

englishText: Your house and your kingdom will endure forever before me; your throne will be established forever.
teluguText: Your house and your kingdom will endure forever before me; your throne will be established forever.

englishText: Bathsheba and Uriah
teluguText: Bathsheba and Uriah

englishText: Put Uriah out in front where the fighting is fiercest.
teluguText: Put Uriah out in front where the fighting is fiercest.

englishText: Absalom's Rebellion
teluguText: Absalom's Rebellion

englishText: Absalom sent secret messengers throughout the tribes of Israel to say, 'As soon as you hear the sound of the trumpets, then say, Absalom is king in Hebron.'
teluguText: Absalom sent secret messengers throughout the tribes of Israel to say, 'As soon as you hear the sound of the trumpets, then say, Absalom is king in Hebron.'

englishText: Solomon Builds the Temple
teluguText: Solomon Builds the Temple

englishText: In the four hundred and eightieth year after the Israelites came out of Egypt... Solomon began to build the temple of the LORD.
teluguText: In the four hundred and eightieth year after the Israelites came out of Egypt... Solomon began to build the temple of the LORD.

englishText: Division of the Kingdom
teluguText: Division of the Kingdom

englishText: All Israel made Jeroboam king over all Israel.
teluguText: All Israel made Jeroboam king over all Israel.

englishText: Elijah and the Prophets of Baal
teluguText: Elijah and the Prophets of Baal

englishText: Then the fire of the LORD fell and burned up the sacrifice.
teluguText: Then the fire of the LORD fell and burned up the sacrifice.

teluguText: Elisha Succeeds Elijah

englishText: Elijah went up to heaven in a whirlwind.
teluguText: Elijah went up to heaven in a whirlwind.

englishText: Hezekiah's Prayer
teluguText: Hezekiah's Prayer

englishText: Hezekiah prayed to the LORD: 'O LORD, God of Israel... you alone are God.'
teluguText: Hezekiah prayed to the LORD: 'O LORD, God of Israel... you alone are God.'

englishText: Josiah's Reform
teluguText: Josiah's Reform

englishText: Neither before nor after Josiah was there a king like him who turned to the LORD as he did.
teluguText: Neither before nor after Josiah was there a king like him who turned to the LORD as he did.

englishText: Fall of Jerusalem
teluguText: Fall of Jerusalem

englishText: He set fire to the temple of the LORD, the royal palace and all the houses of Jerusalem.
teluguText: He set fire to the temple of the LORD, the royal palace and all the houses of Jerusalem.

teluguText: Genealogies of Israel

englishText: Adam, Seth, Enosh...
teluguText: Adam, Seth, Enosh...

teluguText: David Brings the Ark to Jerusalem

teluguText: So all Israel brought up the ark of the covenant of the LORD with shouts.

englishText: David's Plans for the Temple
teluguText: David's Plans for the Temple

teluguText: David said to Solomon: 'My son, I had it in my heart to build a house for the Name of the LORD my God.'

teluguText: Solomon's Temple Dedicated

teluguText: When Solomon finished praying, fire came down from heaven and consumed the burnt offering.

englishText: Jehoshaphat's Victory
teluguText: Jehoshaphat's Victory

englishText: As they began to sing and praise, the LORD set ambushes against the men of Ammon and Moab.
teluguText: As they began to sing and praise, the LORD set ambushes against the men of Ammon and Moab.

englishText: Reforms of Hezekiah
teluguText: Reforms of Hezekiah

englishText: In the first month of the first year of his reign, he opened the doors of the temple of the LORD and repaired them.
teluguText: In the first month of the first year of his reign, he opened the doors of the temple of the LORD and repaired them.

englishText: Fall of Jerusalem
teluguText: Fall of Jerusalem

englishText: They set fire to God's temple and broke down the wall of Jerusalem.
teluguText: They set fire to God's temple and broke down the wall of Jerusalem.

englishText: Return from Exile
teluguText: Return from Exile

englishText: Any of his people among you may go up to Jerusalem in Judah and build the temple of the LORD.
teluguText: Any of his people among you may go up to Jerusalem in Judah and build the temple of the LORD.

englishText: Rebuilding the Temple
teluguText: Rebuilding the Temple

englishText: With praise and thanksgiving they sang to the LORD: 'He is good; his love toward Israel endures forever.'
teluguText: With praise and thanksgiving they sang to the LORD: 'He is good; his love toward Israel endures forever.'

englishText: Ezra Reads the Law
teluguText: Ezra Reads the Law

englishText: Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the LORD.
teluguText: Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the LORD.

englishText: Nehemiah Rebuilds Jerusalem's Walls
teluguText: Nehemiah Rebuilds Jerusalem's Walls

englishText: Come, let us rebuild the wall of Jerusalem, and we will no longer be in disgrace.
teluguText: Come, let us rebuild the wall of Jerusalem, and we will no longer be in disgrace.

englishText: Reading of the Law
teluguText: Reading of the Law

englishText: They read from the Book of the Law of God, making it clear and giving the meaning.
teluguText: They read from the Book of the Law of God, making it clear and giving the meaning.

englishText: Dedication of the Wall
teluguText: Dedication of the Wall

englishText: The sound of rejoicing in Jerusalem could be heard far away.
teluguText: The sound of rejoicing in Jerusalem could be heard far away.

englishText: Esther Becomes Queen
teluguText: Esther Becomes Queen

englishText: Now the king was attracted to Esther more than to any of the other women.
teluguText: Now the king was attracted to Esther more than to any of the other women.

englishText: Haman's Plot
teluguText: Haman's Plot

englishText: Haman looked for a way to destroy all Mordecai's people, the Jews.
teluguText: Haman looked for a way to destroy all Mordecai's people, the Jews.

englishText: Esther Saves Her People
teluguText: Esther Saves Her People

englishText: Grant me my life—this is my petition. And spare my people—this is my request.
teluguText: Grant me my life—this is my petition. And spare my people—this is my request.

englishText: Job's Suffering
teluguText: Job's Suffering

englishText: The LORD gave and the LORD has taken away; may the name of the LORD be praised.
teluguText: The LORD gave and the LORD has taken away; may the name of the LORD be praised.

englishText: Job's Friends' Counsel
teluguText: Job's Friends' Counsel

englishText: They set out from their homes and met together by agreement to go and sympathize with him and comfort him.
teluguText: They set out from their homes and met together by agreement to go and sympathize with him and comfort him.

englishText: God Speaks to Job
teluguText: God Speaks to Job

englishText: Then the LORD spoke to Job out of the storm.
teluguText: Then the LORD spoke to Job out of the storm.

englishText: Job's Restoration
teluguText: Job's Restoration

englishText: After Job had prayed for his friends, the LORD restored his fortunes and gave him twice as much as he had before.
teluguText: After Job had prayed for his friends, the LORD restored his fortunes and gave him twice as much as he had before.

englishText: Psalm of Praise
teluguText: Psalm of Praise

englishText: The LORD is my shepherd, I shall not want.
teluguText: The LORD is my shepherd, I shall not want.

englishText: Psalm of Repentance
teluguText: Psalm of Repentance

englishText: Create in me a pure heart, O God, and renew a steadfast spirit within me.
teluguText: Create in me a pure heart, O God, and renew a steadfast spirit within me.

englishText: Psalm of Thanksgiving
teluguText: Psalm of Thanksgiving

englishText: Enter his gates with thanksgiving and his courts with praise.
teluguText: Enter his gates with thanksgiving and his courts with praise.

englishText: The Beginning of Wisdom
teluguText: The Beginning of Wisdom

englishText: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of knowledge.
teluguText: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of knowledge.

englishText: Trust in the LORD
teluguText: Trust in the LORD

englishText: Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
teluguText: Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.

englishText: A Virtuous Woman
teluguText: A Virtuous Woman

englishText: A wife of noble character who can find? She is worth far more than rubies.
teluguText: A wife of noble character who can find? She is worth far more than rubies.

englishText: Everything is Meaningless
teluguText: Everything is Meaningless

englishText: Meaningless! Meaningless! says the Teacher. Utterly meaningless! Everything is meaningless.
teluguText: Meaningless! Meaningless! says the Teacher. Utterly meaningless! Everything is meaningless.

englishText: A Time for Everything
teluguText: A Time for Everything

englishText: There is a time for everything, and a season for every activity under the heavens.
teluguText: There is a time for everything, and a season for every activity under the heavens.

englishText: Remember Your Creator
teluguText: Remember Your Creator

englishText: Remember your Creator in the days of your youth.
teluguText: Remember your Creator in the days of your youth.

englishText: The Bride and Bridegroom
teluguText: The Bride and Bridegroom

englishText: My beloved is mine and I am his.
teluguText: My beloved is mine and I am his.

englishText: Love's Strength
teluguText: Love's Strength

englishText: Love is as strong as death, its jealousy unyielding as the grave.
teluguText: Love is as strong as death, its jealousy unyielding as the grave.

englishText: Isaiah's Vision
teluguText: Isaiah's Vision

englishText: I saw the Lord, high and exalted, seated on a throne.
teluguText: I saw the Lord, high and exalted, seated on a throne.

englishText: Prophecy of the Messiah
teluguText: Prophecy of the Messiah

englishText: For to us a child is born, to us a son is given.
teluguText: For to us a child is born, to us a son is given.

englishText: Suffering Servant
teluguText: Suffering Servant

englishText: He was pierced for our transgressions, he was crushed for our iniquities.
teluguText: He was pierced for our transgressions, he was crushed for our iniquities.

englishText: Jeremiah's Call
teluguText: Jeremiah's Call

englishText: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, before you were born I set you apart.
teluguText: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, before you were born I set you apart.

englishText: Prophecy of the New Covenant
teluguText: Prophecy of the New Covenant

englishText: I will make a new covenant with the people of Israel and with the people of Judah.
teluguText: I will make a new covenant with the people of Israel and with the people of Judah.

englishText: Fall of Jerusalem
teluguText: Fall of Jerusalem

englishText: On the ninth day of the fourth month of Zedekiah's eleventh year, the city wall was broken through.
teluguText: On the ninth day of the fourth month of Zedekiah's eleventh year, the city wall was broken through.

englishText: Jerusalem's Destruction
teluguText: Jerusalem's Destruction

englishText: How deserted lies the city, once so full of people!
teluguText: How deserted lies the city, once so full of people!

englishText: Great Is Your Faithfulness
teluguText: Great Is Your Faithfulness

englishText: Great is your faithfulness.
teluguText: Great is your faithfulness.

teluguText: Vision of the Valley of Dry Bones

englishText: I will make breath enter you, and you will come to life.
teluguText: I will make breath enter you, and you will come to life.

teluguText: Vision of God's Glory

englishText: This was the appearance of the likeness of the glory of the LORD.
teluguText: This was the appearance of the likeness of the glory of the LORD.

teluguText: Prophecy Against Gog

englishText: Son of man, set your face against Gog of the land of Magog.
teluguText: Son of man, set your face against Gog of the land of Magog.

teluguText: Daniel in the Lion's Den

englishText: My God sent his angel, and he shut the mouths of the lions.
teluguText: My God sent his angel, and he shut the mouths of the lions.

teluguText: Fiery Furnace

teluguText: I see four men walking around in the fire, unbound and unharmed.

teluguText: Nebuchadnezzar's Dream

englishText: The mystery was revealed to Daniel in a vision.
teluguText: The mystery was revealed to Daniel in a vision.

teluguText: Hosea's Marriage to Gomer

englishText: Go, marry a promiscuous woman and have children with her.
teluguText: Go, marry a promiscuous woman and have children with her.

teluguText: God's Love for Israel

englishText: I led them with cords of human kindness, with ties of love.
teluguText: I led them with cords of human kindness, with ties of love.

teluguText: The Locust Plague

englishText: What the locust swarm has left the great locusts have eaten.
teluguText: What the locust swarm has left the great locusts have eaten.

teluguText: Promise of the Spirit

englishText: I will pour out my Spirit on all people.
teluguText: I will pour out my Spirit on all people.

teluguText: Judgment on Israel

teluguText: Therefore I will send you into exile beyond Damascus.

teluguText: Vision of the Plumb Line

teluguText: I am setting a plumb line among my people Israel.

englishText: Prophecy Against Edom
teluguText: Prophecy Against Edom

teluguText: We have heard a message from the LORD: An envoy was sent to the nations to say, 'Rise, let us go against her for battle.'

englishText: Restoration of Israel
teluguText: Restoration of Israel

englishText: But on Mount Zion will be deliverance; it will be holy, and Jacob will possess his inheritance.
teluguText: But on Mount Zion will be deliverance; it will be holy, and Jacob will possess his inheritance.

englishText: Jonah Flees from God
teluguText: Jonah Flees from God

englishText: But Jonah ran away from the LORD and headed for Tarshish.
teluguText: But Jonah ran away from the LORD and headed for Tarshish.

teluguText: Jonah in the Fish

englishText: From inside the fish Jonah prayed to the LORD his God.
teluguText: From inside the fish Jonah prayed to the LORD his God.

englishText: Nineveh Repents
teluguText: Nineveh Repents

englishText: The Ninevites believed God. A fast was proclaimed, and all of them, from the greatest to the least, put on sackcloth.
teluguText: The Ninevites believed God. A fast was proclaimed, and all of them, from the greatest to the least, put on sackcloth.

englishText: Prophecy of Bethlehem
teluguText: Prophecy of Bethlehem

englishText: But you, Bethlehem Ephrathah, though you are small among the clans of Judah, out of you will come for me one who will be ruler over Israel.
teluguText: But you, Bethlehem Ephrathah, though you are small among the clans of Judah, out of you will come for me one who will be ruler over Israel.

englishText: Call for Justice
teluguText: Call for Justice

englishText: He has shown you, O mortal, what is good. And what does the LORD require of you? To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with your God.
teluguText: He has shown you, O mortal, what is good. And what does the LORD require of you? To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with your God.

englishText: Prophecy Against Nineveh
teluguText: Prophecy Against Nineveh

teluguText: A prophecy concerning Nineveh. The book of the vision of Nahum the Elkoshite.

englishText: Fall of Nineveh
teluguText: Fall of Nineveh

englishText: All who hear the news about you clap their hands at your fall.
teluguText: All who hear the news about you clap their hands at your fall.

englishText: Habakkuk's Complaint
teluguText: Habakkuk's Complaint

englishText: How long, LORD, must I call for help, but you do not listen?
teluguText: How long, LORD, must I call for help, but you do not listen?

englishText: The Righteous Will Live by Faith
teluguText: The Righteous Will Live by Faith

englishText: But the righteous person will live by his faithfulness.
teluguText: But the righteous person will live by his faithfulness.

englishText: The Day of the LORD
teluguText: The Day of the LORD

englishText: The great day of the LORD is near—near and coming quickly.
teluguText: The great day of the LORD is near—near and coming quickly.

englishText: Promise to the Remnant
teluguText: Promise to the Remnant

englishText: The LORD your God is with you, the Mighty Warrior who saves.
teluguText: The LORD your God is with you, the Mighty Warrior who saves.

englishText: Call to Rebuild the Temple
teluguText: Call to Rebuild the Temple

englishText: Go up into the mountains and bring down timber and build my house.
teluguText: Go up into the mountains and bring down timber and build my house.

englishText: Future Glory of the Temple
teluguText: Future Glory of the Temple

englishText: The glory of this present house will be greater than the glory of the former house.
teluguText: The glory of this present house will be greater than the glory of the former house.

englishText: Vision of the Horses
teluguText: Vision of the Horses

englishText: I saw a man riding a red horse!
teluguText: I saw a man riding a red horse!

englishText: Prophecy of the King
teluguText: Prophecy of the King

englishText: See, your king comes to you, righteous and victorious, lowly and riding on a donkey.
teluguText: See, your king comes to you, righteous and victorious, lowly and riding on a donkey.

englishText: The Messenger of the Covenant
teluguText: The Messenger of the Covenant

englishText: I will send my messenger, who will prepare the way before me.
teluguText: I will send my messenger, who will prepare the way before me.

englishText: Promise of Elijah
teluguText: Promise of Elijah

englishText: See, I will send the prophet Elijah to you before that great and dreadful day of the LORD comes.
teluguText: See, I will send the prophet Elijah to you before that great and dreadful day of the LORD comes.
